message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take a smaller share, I'm feeling generous!
I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking most of the cash!
I'm not giving up yet! Take a bigger share, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
You're running out of options, take the crumbs!
I'll take the last crumb, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're out of options, I'm taking it all!
I'm not accepting defeat, I'll take nothing and walk away!
